passive.name: Mind Game
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases the wearer's Skill DMG and Ultimate DMG dealt by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{5}} turn(s). After the wearer uses their Ultimate, if this Ultimate consumed {{3}} or more Energy, recovers 1 Skill Point.
